talk.author: did:plc:sflxm2fxohaqpfgahgdlm7rl
talk.utter:
Any account you've blocked won't be displayed in your list of followers

However, because of technical limitations your follower count won't go down

But the important thing is that they can't see your posts or interact with you in any way
